comments.body: can we add the test to azure_rm_virtualnetwork test as it's dependent?

i checked azure_rm_virtualnetwork test already, it's a long test list, i think it's more efficient to create a new test for vent peering in case any change in peering will need run whole vnet test. In one word, I have same idea before, after looked at existing test, created new one.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +5,9 @@    peering_name: "peering1{{ resource_group | hash('md5') | truncate(7, True, '') }}{{ 100 | random }}"

- name: Create first virtual network
  azure_rm_virtualnetwork:
    name: "{{ vnetname1 }}"
